node.description: Interactive photo gallery that displays images larger when clicked.

node.description: Mock company employee directory. AJAX used to pull data from a random employee API, which populates screen with tiles of employee info.

node.description: App that pulls photos from Flickr API based on search terms and predefined page queries.
